data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Jamalpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jamalpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Jamalpur that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,872 believers in Jamalpur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Jamalpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Mallah Kewat (Muslim traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Mallah Kewat (Muslim traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Mallah Kewat (Muslim traditions) people is yours.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Jamalpur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Jamalpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Jamalpur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Jamalpur
location.people_groups_list: Mallah Dhawa (Muslim traditions), Bhoi (Hindu traditions), Badaik, Bhar, Matia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mallah Dhawa (Muslim traditions) (11,000), Bhoi (Hindu traditions) (8,400), Badaik (1,000), Bhar (5,000), Matia (38,000)
